name: Brittle Bones
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, you may only collect up to 7 points at the end of the round.

name: Icy Roads
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, you cannot play Disaster Insurance cards during scoring.

name: Juice Cleanse
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, ignore advantages from your Dinosaur Trait during scoring.

name: Leechy Keen
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, you cannot play more than 1 Instant card per round.

name: Live. Laugh. Lava.
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, the effects of Score Sapper and Score Booster cards you play are halved.

name: Ollie Oops
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, subtract 2 from the value of Point cards you play during Sudden Death.

name: Restraining Order
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, you cannot play Score Sapper cards during scoring.

name: Rex Marks the Spot
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, subtract 1 point from you score for each Instant card you play during scoring.

name: Rock Slide
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, double disadvantages from you Dinosaur Trait during scoring.

name: Slippery Slope
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, each round after scores have been calculated, move your Dinosaur meeple backward 1 space on your Escape Route.

name: Tarnished Plans
effect: If this card is in your Hazard Area, you cannot play Score Booster cards during scoring.

name: Up in Flames
effect: If this card is in you Hazard Area, subtract 1 point from your score for each Hazard card in your Hazard Area during scoring.
